DOC.brief_summary: In randomized trial , investigate activity toxicity two active regimen , gemcitabine/irinotecan paclitaxel/carboplatin/Etoposide ( follow ZD1839 ) first-line treatment patient carcinoma unknown primary site .
DOC.brief_title: Gemcitabine/Irinotecan/ZD1839 v Paclitaxel/Carboplatin/Etoposide/ZD1839 Carcinoma Unknown Primary Site
DOC.detailed_description: Upon determination eligibility , patient randomly assign one two treatment arm : - Paclitaxel + Carboplatin + Etoposide - Irinotecan + Gemcitabine Patients stratify tumor location ( liver/bone versus others ) number metastatic site ( one versus two ) . Patients objective response stable disease completion chemotherapy receive ZD1839 disease progression . Patients respond chemotherapy may crossover chemotherapy regimen receive ZD1839 objective response stable disease . The study blind patient doctor know treatment assign .
DOC.criteria: To include study , must meet following criterion : Carcinoma unknown primary site Biopsyproven metastatic carcinoma Able perform activity daily live minimal assistance No previous treatment systemic therapy Measurable evaluable disease Adequate bone marrow , liver kidney function Understand nature study give write informed consent You participate study follow apply : Age < 18 year Uncontrolled brain metastasis meningeal involvement Other uncontrolled malignancy Women pregnant lactate Recent history significant cardiovascular disease Severe uncontrolled systemic disease Other significant clinical disorder Clinically active interstitial lung disease Please note : There additional inclusion/exclusion criterion . The study center determine meet criterion . If qualify trial , study personnel explain reason . If qualify , study personnel explain trial detail answer question may .
